comments.comments_text: Goal! Eden Hazard passes the ball to Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Chelsea) and he fires in a shot from the edge of the box which is deflected. Rui Patricio couldn't do anything about it. 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] passes the ball to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) and he fires in a shot from the edge of the box which is deflected. [PLAYER] couldn't do anything about it. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Willian (Chelsea) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger. It will be a corner kick for Chelsea.

comments.comments_text: Willian (Chelsea) collects a brilliant pass inside the box and finds himself in a goal scoring opportunity. He takes a shot, but the effort is well blocked by one of the defending players. Chelsea have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Joao Moutinho (Wolves) was quite harsh and Jonathan Moss didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Raul Jimenez (Wolves) finds himself some space inside the box to get on the end of a pass from Morgan Gibbs-White, then sends the ball low into the middle of the net. 1:1.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Matt Doherty plays a lovely pass into the box and finds Diogo Jota (Wolves). He tries his luck from close range and coolly strikes the ball into the back of the net. 2:1.
